results.title: International IT Company is looking for an experienced IT Business analyst in Poland or Turkey
results.long_description:
You understand the IT field, and development methodologies and have analytical skills. You are ready to prove your knowledge of written and spoken English.
The company is developing and we are looking for a new employee.

Requirements

‚Ä¢ Excellent documentation, communication, and facilitation skills.
‚Ä¢ Experience in working with cross-functional teams and multiple stakeholders at all levels, understanding objectives, values, and success measures for solutions.
‚Ä¢ High-level analytical skills showed through the ability to assess or interpret complex information and make clear and logical decisions.
‚Ä¢ English level ‚Äî Advanced or Fluent
‚Ä¢ Experience in working with Jira/Confluence, Slack, and Trello is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Background in IT is a big plus.
‚Ä¢ Ability to multi-task under deadlines.

Key Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Assist top management: analyze available data and our own projects, prepare analytical reports, other relevant data, documentation, and materials for making further decisions.
‚Ä¢ Preparing project and company presentations, and using creative and structural approaches while working on them. Creating Use Case requirements.
‚Ä¢ Join the meetings with the prospective clients in order to present our company and its services, and facilitate negotiation of requirements among multiple stakeholders at all levels.
‚Ä¢ Use current corporate practices of project evaluation, estimation, and documentation, to perform an initial evaluation of the potential projects.
‚Ä¢ Work in collaboration with the top and middle management, development teams, and sales to positively contribute to the seamless delivery of new products to our customers ‚Äî from design, development, testing, and through to delivery and ongoing performance analysis.
Projects

Technology solutions in real estate, security, telecommunications, healthcare, Internet, consumer electronics, etc.

What We Offer:
‚Ä¢	We‚Äôre investing in your growth through meetups, webinars, training, certificates
‚Ä¢	Minimum bureaucracy and micromanagement
‚Ä¢	English courses (study and practice)
‚Ä¢	Remote (with future relocation)
‚Ä¢	Positive and friendly office culture, open-minded team, and quick decision-making management
‚Ä¢	The ability to change projects (depends on tech stack, the ability to try yourself in different roles)
Writing  Supporting Documentation
Documenting requirements
Competitive Analysis
Eliciting requirements
About us:
Right&Above is a full-service technology solutions provider based in the Washington, DC metropolitan area with offices in Kyiv, Ukraine.

We are working with clients in various industries, including Security, Telecommunications, Healthcare, Internet, FinTech, Real Estate, Consumer Electronics, and many more.

Our services include but are not limited to, Software Development, Mobile Applications Development, Infrastructure Management, Systems & Database Administration, Systems Integration, Electronics Engineering, Graphic Design, IT Administration, Hosting, and Private Cloud Solutions.

There may be other projects with great technologies, so feel free to send your CV. 
You are welcome!

recruiter.name: Nataliia Khvostikova
recruiter.employer_about:
Right&Above is a full-service technology solutions provider based in the Washington, DC metropolitan area with offices in Kiev, Ukraine.

We are working with clients in various industries, including Security, Telecommunications, Healthcare, Internet, FinTech, Real Estate, Consumer Electronics, and many more.

Our services include, but not limited to, Software Development, Mobile Applications Development, Infrastructure Management, Systems & Database Administration, Systems Integration, Electronics Engineering, Graphic Design, IT Administration, Hosting and Private Cloud Solutions.

results.title: Senior React developer
results.long_description:
Professional team is looking for an experienced  Senior React developer for an international project.

‚Ä¢ European citizen ( with european passport only )
‚Ä¢ 100% remote

Requirements:
‚Ä¢  A minimum of 6 years working as a developer
‚Ä¢  A minimum of 4 years working with React
‚Ä¢  Advanced TypeScript and JavaScript knowledge are preferred
‚Ä¢  A minimum of 2 years experience with porting designs (e.g. Figma) to functional styled React components
‚Ä¢  You have worked in a team with a formal planning methodology (Scrum or something else) for 5+ year
‚Ä¢  Fluent with Git (we are power users of Github)

Desired skills:
‚Ä¢  Preferably some experience with a modern state management library (e.g. Redux)
‚Ä¢  English level B2 mini

About the project:
The product is an application used by pharmacists to engage with patients. 
Which means:
‚Ä¢  sending messages, receiving refills, creating tasks and reminders, scheduling appointments
‚Ä¢  with patients, scheduling vaccinations, etc.

recruiter.name: Natalia Tsapenko
recruiter.employer_about:
We're a group of professional software addicts. The harder challenge infuses more dopamine into our brains. We see no life without coding because of the programming gene that lives in our DNA.

We're software positive!

Established by senior IT business professionals with many years of intensive experience in the IT industry, today SoftPositive is a strategic software development vendor and partner to companies in the USA and Europe with its main development center in Ukraine. We bring our expertise and experience of large software development companies into SMB segment: start-ups and mature companies looking for the best value-to-money ratio.

We offer:
‚Ä¢ Challenging projects for enterprise customers in US, EU, and Australia
‚Ä¢ Friendly and supportive environment
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary
‚Ä¢ 100% remote job
‚Ä¢ Flexible work hours

results.title: Senior Java Developer with Relocation to Germany (M√ºnchen)
results.long_description:
THIS IS NOT A REMOTE JOB! WE ARE LOOKING FOR CANDIDATES WHO ARE READY TO RELOCATE TO MUNICH.

We are looking for PHP Developers for our international e-commerce company in Munich. We specialize in the development of solutions for our own online shops.

SKILLS
- 4+ years of experience working with Java, Spring Boot
- experience working with Microservices
- experience working with Docker, Maven, Jenkins, GIT
- English: Upper intermediate level (B2+/C1/C2)

NICE TO HAVE
- German language

RESPONSIBILITIES
- Building and supporting high-load systems
- Development of complex web solutions
- Communication with colleagues in English

WE OFFER
Exciting work in a fast-growing company. Responsibility, creative freedom, learning new technologies, and communication with international colleagues.

- Flexible work schedule
- Home office is possible up to 2 days a week
- Language courses & trainings
- Team building activities & office lunches
- Career opportunities

SALARY
65.000 ‚Äì 90.000 euro brutto per year.

About IT Job Germany

results.title: Web3 Backend Engineer
results.long_description:
**We are Blaize.**

Founded in 2016, Blaize company covers all areas of blockchain and crypto development, including projects in DeFi, NFT-related products, blockchain ecosystems, protocols, and smart contracts. We have completed over 70 successful projects in different areas of blockchain development and conducted more than 110 smart contract audits.

Our value and pride are our team. It consists of professionals united by a common idea and interests with a high level of expertise in their field. We love our work and are always ready to help each other.

We believe that a company can only be successful when each one of its employees strives for professional and personal growth. So we encourage freedom of thought and creativity of our people and are open to new ideas and visions generated by them.

Our mission is to create a convenient decentralized world of finance where everyone is the owner of their assets.
Our team is constantly growing, and we are currently looking for a **Web3 Backend engineer** to expand the core team.

**Your profile:** 
*Experience with Node.js (Nest.js or Express.js) for at least 2 years.
*Knowledge in the blockchain field.
*Basic knowledge of web3.js or ethers.js.
*Hands-on experience in building REST services.
*Hands-on experience with MongoDB or similar document store.
*Hands-on experience with Redis or similar key-value cache.
*Experience with Github version control system.
*Ability to work in English speaking environment (at least Intermediat—É).

**Tasks:**
*Estimate tasks and execute them timely.
*Cooperate with stakeholders and project team to clarify task requirements.
*Cooperate with senior team members to receive code review.
*Research and implement solutions that fulfills product requirements.

**Will be a plus:**
*Experience with one of the test frameworks (Mocha, Chai.js, Jest).
*Working experience with TypeScript.
*Experience with Subgraph technology.
*Working experience with PostgreSQL or similar SQL solution.

**We offer:**
*Contract basis of collaboration.
*Hourly payment.

recruiter.name: Anastasia Tkach
recruiter.employer_about:
We are Blaize.

‚ñ™Ô∏è Founded in 2016, Blaize company covers all areas of blockchain and crypto development, including projects in DeFi, NFT-related products, blockchain ecosystems, protocols, and smart contracts. Blaize provides a wide range of services, including smart contract audits, custom blockchain development, tailor-made enterprise solutions, consulting, and much more. We have completed over 70 successful projects in different areas of blockchain development and conducted more than 110 smart contract audits. Our clients are Aurora, 1inch, PeakDeFi, LeagueDAO, and Celo.

‚ñ™Ô∏è Our value and pride are our teams. It comprises over 65 professionals united by a common idea and interests with a high level of expertise in their field. We love our work and are always ready to help each other.
‚ñ™Ô∏è We believe that a company can only be successful when each one of its employees strives for professional and personal growth. So we encourage freedom of thought and creativity of our people and are open to new ideas and visions generated by them.

üîªOur mission is to create a convenient decentralized world of finance where everyone is the owner of their assets.

üîªOur values:

‚ñ™Ô∏è Our team and its expertise are our greatest strengths. Our employees have international certifications and create their own courses. We have internal knowledge-sharing sessions, and PDP plans to ensure that our expertise grows. Here you can develop from junior to senior!

‚ñ™Ô∏è Innovations. We operate on the technology edge already today. We deal with Polkadot and Cosmos ecosystems and already have mastered 20+ blockchains: Ethereum, NEAR, Solana, Avalanche, Arbitrum, and Optimism, naming a few. While others learn, we already work with brand-new chains like Aptos, Sui, Secret Network, StarkNet.
Blaize is a full-cycle blockchain development company. Our expertise helps us to provide the best solutions for launching your blockchain project. Also, we have the RnD department that constantly works on researching and adapting new technologies and approaches.

‚ñ™Ô∏è Supportive atmosphere. It is crucial for us that every employee feels comfortable with us. Therefore, we have various mentoring programs, onboarding managers, and a transparent KPI system with feedback.

With us, you can count not only on support, but also on financial assistance in difficult times.

üîªOur achievements:
‚ñ™Ô∏è By the beginning of 2023, we have already participated in more than 10 web3 and web2 hackathons. We are proud of the Blaize team that received prizes and nominations for many hackathons. Let‚Äôs take a look at the most impressive ones of them: a nomination for the Urbit Hackathon 2023, the nomination from Ref.finance at the NEARCON 2022 in Lisbon, winner of NEAR.HACK 2021.

‚ñ™Ô∏è Also, we often gain grants for development from different foundations. The last one was the grant from Web3 Foundation for the Unified Collator Deployment Solution on Polkadot.

üîªOur company is actively involved in the development of the industry by creating training courses for blockchain specialists. The recent one was a free full Solana and Rust programming course for beginners, that the Blaize experts wrote with the IdeaSoft team. Also, we have internal courses for our employees. We launched a new course ‚ÄúPM basics‚Äù on March 1, 2023.

‚ñ™Ô∏è We believe our employees are our greatest asset, and we are always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for the blockchain domain. If you want to join a team that values creativity, innovation, and hard work, submit your application today!

Check out our roles!

results.title: Web3 Frontend Engineer
results.long_description:
**We are Blaize.**

Founded in 2016, Blaize company covers all areas of blockchain and crypto development, including projects in DeFi, NFT-related products, blockchain ecosystems, protocols, and smart contracts. We have completed over 70 successful projects in different areas of blockchain development and conducted more than 110 smart contract audits.

Our value and pride are our team. It consists of professionals united by a common idea and interests with a high level of expertise in their field. We love our work and are always ready to help each other.

We believe that a company can only be successful when each one of its employees strives for professional and personal growth. So we encourage freedom of thought and creativity of our people and are open to new ideas and visions generated by them.

Our mission is to create a convenient decentralized world of finance where everyone is the owner of their assets.


Our team is constantly growing, and we are currently looking for a **Web3 Frontend engineer** to expand the core team.

**Your profile:**
*1+ years in commercial software development.
*Good knowledge of HTML, CSS (HTML5 & CSS3).
*Good knowledge of JavaScript.
*Knowledge of web development best practices.
*Experience with React or Next.js.
*Experience in the blockchain field.
*Experience with web3.js or ethers.js.
*Experience with integrating wallet providers (such as Metamask).
*Experience with Github version control system.
*English - intermediate level.

**Tasks:**
*Estimate tasks and execute them timely.
*Cooperate with stakeholders and project team to clarify task requirements.
*Cooperate with senior team members to receive code review.
*Research and implement solutions that fulfills product requirements.

**Will be a plus:**
*Understanding of REST API.
*Working experience with TypeScript.
*Working experience with Ethereum RPC.

**We offer:**
*Contract basis of collaboration.
*Hourly payment.
